header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Operation, infections, tablets, friendships, acupuncture, family, rugby, skiing, cars (MOT/new tyres), hospital appointments.
header.activity: Catching up over coffee with family and friends
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling, telling jokes
